history.narrative: Law 19-170, the “Firearms Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-614. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Mar. 6, 2012, and Apr. 17, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 15, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-366 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-170 became effective on Sept. 26, 2012.
